DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, a.ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, a.TERM_CD, a.QLFR_CD, a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, a.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.CREATD_TM_STMP, a.CREATD_USER_ID, b.CD_DESC_TXT, c.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, ITEM b, ITEM c WHERE a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ? AND (a.TERM_CD = b.PRMRY_CD(+) AND b.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934) AND (a.QLFR_CD = c.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935)

SELECT ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, TERM_CD, QLFR_CD, ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID,ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER({0}) AND ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT max(ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER({0}))

SELECT ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, TERM_CD, QLFR_CD, ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID,ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER({0}) AND ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT max(ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER({0}) AND ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION')

SELECT A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, A.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, A.ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, A.TERM_CD, A.QLFR_CD, A.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, A.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, A.LST_CHG_TMS, A.LST_CHG_USR, A.CREATD_TM_STMP, A.CREATD_USER_ID, B.CD_DESC_TXT, C.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR A, ITEM B, ITEM C WHERE UPPER(ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER({0}) AND A.TERM_CD = B.PRMRY_CD(+) AND B.CTLG_ID(+)=1934 AND A.QLFR_CD = C.PRMRY_CD(+) AND C.CTLG_ID(+)=1935 ORDER BY A.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR DESC

SELECT ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, max(ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) AS ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' GROUP BY ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT ORDER BY ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminOption
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT DISTINCT A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, A.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, A.ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, A.TERM_CD, A.QLFR_CD, A.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, A.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, A.LST_CHG_TMS, A.LST_CHG_USR, A.CREATD_TM_STMP, A.CREATD_USER_ID, B.CD_DESC_TXT,C.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR A, ITEM B, ITEM C,QSTNR_MSTR D WHERE 1 = 1

AND A.TERM_CD = B.PRMRY_CD(+) AND b.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934 AND A.QLFR_CD = C.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 AND A.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT max(X.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR) FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR X WHERE UPPER(X.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) = UPPER(A.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT))
ORDER BY UPPER(A.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT) ASC

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO ADMIN_OPT_MSTR( ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, TERM_CD, QLFR_CD, ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD,LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR,CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID,ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ADMIN_OPT_MSTR SET TERM_CD = ?, QLFR_CD = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = ? WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM QSTNR_DOMN_INFO WHERE QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID IN (SELECT QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM QSTNR_MSTR WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, A.SQNC_NBR, B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC, A.PRMRY_CD,c.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN A, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR B,ITEM c where A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (a.PRMRY_CD = c.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1938) order by A.SQNC_NBR

SELECT B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, A.SQNC_NBR,A.PRMRY_CD,C.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN A, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR B,ITEM C WHERE A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {0} AND (A.PRMRY_CD = C.PRMRY_CD(+) AND C.CTLG_ID(+) = 1938) AND B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC IN (SELECT x.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC FROM ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR X WHERE X.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC in (SELECT Y.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC FROM ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR Y WHERE Y.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR) AND B.QSTN_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT max(QSTN_VRSN_NBR) FROM ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR WHERE QSTN_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC in (SELECT Z.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC FROM ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR Z WHERE Z.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = a.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR)))
ORDER BY A.SQNC_NBR
SELECT max(SQNC_NBR),ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID FROM ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {0} group by ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN (ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, SQNC_NBR, PRMRY_CD, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP) VALUES ( ?, ?,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,?)
UPDATE ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN SET SQNC_NBR = ?, PRMRY_CD = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ? WHERE ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = ? and ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ? and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, a.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, a.ADMIN_OPT_RFRNC_ID, a.TERM_CD, a.QLFR_CD, a.ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR, a.ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.CREATD_TM_STMP, a.CREATD_USER_ID, b.CD_DESC_TXT, c.CD_DESC_TXT FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR a, ITEM b, ITEM c WHERE a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ? AND (a.TERM_CD = b.PRMRY_CD(+) AND b.CTLG_ID(+) = 1934) AND (a.QLFR_CD = c.PRMRY_CD(+) AND c.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935)

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE ADMIN_OPT_MSTR SET TERM_CD = ?, QLFR_CD = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, ADMIN_OPT_STTS_CD = ?,ADMIN_OPT_VRSN_NBR = ? WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
SELECT G.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, A.PRNT_QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, A.RFRNC_ID, B.OVRD_ANSWR_ID, D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC, E.PSBL_ANSWR, F.CD_DESC_TXT, D.PRVDR_ARNGMNT, G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, CASE (SELECT 'Y' FROM note_domain_ovrd_val note,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN admn WHERE prmry_enty_type ='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND prmry_enty_id = {1} AND scndry_enty_id = {4} AND scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND admn.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND NOTE.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = admn.bnft_defn_sys_id AND admn.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = note.scndry_enty_id ) WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS NOTE_EXIST, DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') AND ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR ), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN FROM QSTNR_MSTR A,
(SELECT A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, A.OVRD_ANSWR_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD A
WHERE A.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = {4} AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {1}
AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3}
UNION ALL
SELECT qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, psbl_answr_id FROM (SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.psbl_answr_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr FROM (SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr FROM qstnr_mstr a WHERE a.admin_opt_sys_id = {2} AND A.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = A.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id UNION ALL
SELECT
b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr
FROM cntrct_answr_ovrd A,
qstnr_mstr b
WHERE A.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = {4} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = b.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.ovrd_answr_id = b.prnt_answr_id AND b.admin_opt_sys_id = {2} ) a, psbl_answr b WHERE A.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND b.psbl_answr = 'Not Answered' AND a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id NOT IN (SELECT qstnr_hrchy_sys_id FROM cntrct_answr_ovrd A WHERE A.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = {4}
AND bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} ) ) a, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR e
WHERE a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = e.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND isdomainvalid ('contract',{5},'QUESTION',A.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id) = 'T' AND (e.PRVDR_ARNGMNT is null or e.PRVDR_ARNGMNT IN (SELECT z.pva_id FROM enty_domn_info x, avlbl_domn y, prod_fmly_buss_enty_pva_map z , cntrct_dt_sgmnt a, prod_mstr b WHERE x.enty_type = 'contract' AND x.enty_sys_id = {5} AND x.domn_sys_id = y.domn_sys_id AND y.bus_enty_nm = z.buss_enty_id AND z.prod_fmly_id = b.prod_fmly_nm AND b.prod_sys_id = A.prod_sys_id AND A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} )) ) B, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR D,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN G, PSBL_ANSWR E, ITEM F
WHERE A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = B.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = G.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND G.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = {4} AND D.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND E.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = B.OVRD_ANSWR_ID AND E.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = A.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND A.RFRNC_ID = F.PRMRY_CD(+) AND F.CTLG_ID (+) =1938 ORDER BY A.QSTNR_DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SELECT UNIQUE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, d.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, a.rfrnc_id, e.cd_desc_txt, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, c.ovrd_answr_id, f.psbl_answr, a.sqnc_nbr FROM qstnr_mstr a, enty_admn_opt_assn b, cntrct_admin_qstn_answr_ovrd c, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr d, item e, psbl_answr f WHERE a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = c.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = c.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND a.rfrnc_id = e.prmry_cd AND e.ctlg_id = 1938 AND c.ovrd_answr_id = f.psbl_answr_id AND b.enty_type = 'CONTRACT' AND b.enty_sys_id = {0} AND a.admin_opt_sys_id = {1} ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.rfrnc_id, c.psbl_answr_id, b.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, c.psbl_answr, d.cd_desc_txt, a.sqnc_nbr, b.prvdr_arngmnt, DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL note,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN admn WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {3} AND PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_ID ={4} and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHQUESTION' and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={5} AND admn.bnft_admin_sys_id = {6} AND NOTE.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = admn.bnft_defn_sys_id), 0, 'N','Y') NOTE_EXISTS ,
DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN,f.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM qstnr_mstr a, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr b, psbl_answr c, item d, cmst_cntrct_mstr e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN f WHERE b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND prnt_answr_id = {0} AND prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = {1} AND UPPER (c.psbl_answr) = 'NOT ANSWERED' AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND e.cntrct_sys_id = {2} AND f.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID ={4} AND isdomainvalid ('contract', e.cntrct_parnt_sys_id, 'QUESTION', qstnr_hrchy_sys_id ) = 'T' AND IsValidQuestionPVA ('contract',{3},'question',B.PRVDR_ARNGMNT,B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR) ='T' ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SELECT a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, a.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, a.rfrnc_id, c.psbl_answr_id, b.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, c.psbl_answr, d.cd_desc_txt, a.sqnc_nbr, b.prvdr_arngmnt, DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TIER_NOTE_OVRD_VAL note,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN admn WHERE PRMRY_ENTY_ID = {3} AND PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' AND SCNDRY_ENTY_ID ={4} and SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHQUESTION' and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR and bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={5} AND admn.bnft_admin_sys_id = {6} AND NOTE.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = admn.bnft_defn_sys_id and TIER_SYS_ID={7}), 0, 'N','Y') NOTE_EXISTS , DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QSTN_DOMN_ASSN WHERE DOMN_CD IN ('INFO-CC','INFO-SS','C-CNFG','C-MNUL') and ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = b.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR), 0, 'N','Y') VALID_DOMAIN,f.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM qstnr_mstr a, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr b, psbl_answr c, item d, cmst_cntrct_mstr e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN f WHERE b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND prnt_answr_id = {0} AND prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = {1} AND UPPER (c.psbl_answr) = 'NOT ANSWERED' AND a.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND e.cntrct_sys_id = {2} AND f.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID ={4} AND isdomainvalid ('contract', e.cntrct_parnt_sys_id, 'QUESTION', qstnr_hrchy_sys_id ) = 'T' AND IsValidQuestionPVA ('contract',{3},'question',B.PRVDR_ARNGMNT,B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR) ='T' ORDER BY a.sqnc_nbr

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID =?

INSERT INTO CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD ( ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, OVRD_ANSWR_ID, DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP,BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)
UPDATE CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD SET OVRD_ANSWR_ID = ? WHERE (BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID =?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID= ?

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID =?

INSERT INTO CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD ( ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, OVRD_ANSWR_ID, DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP,BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?)
UPDATE CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD SET OVRD_ANSWR_ID = ? WHERE (BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID =? AND CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = ? )
